label.OD_SECURE_PIN_ENTER_CODE_INFO_TEXT: Now enter the code we just sent you.
label.OD_SECURE_PIN_SEND_NEW_CODE_INFO_TEXT: If you don't get the code after a few minutes, have us send a new one.
label.OD_SECURE_PIN_VERIFICATION_OPTIONS_UNAVA: Verification code texts are free. Why are some options unavailable?

label.OD_SECURE_PIN_SEND_VERIFICATION_CODE_PRO: Got it. Which device should we text the code to?
label.OD_SECURE_PIN_CHOOSE_LINE_TEXT: Choose a line from your account
